item.description:
This 28 mile ride will start out in at the 30 Keyes Rd Parking area in Concord

Folks should plan to meet at 1:00 pm and be ready to ride around 1:15 pm.
We should return to the parking area around 4:00 pm which will hopefully be before any afternoon T-Storms (high of 88 on sunday, so not so hot)

Note: The only public bathroom on this ride is at the starting point at the Keyes Parking area.

Starting location: 30 Keyes Rd Parking Area
http://goo.gl/maps/mgoP

The route:
http://goo.gl/maps/H2L7


Route Summary:
This ride explores wooded roads, fields, farms of Concord, Sudbury, Lincoln and Weston and a tiny bit of Waltham along the Cambridge Reservoir.


After Ride Option

Main Street Market and Cafe
42 Main Street, Concord, MA
mainstreetsmarketandcafe.com

Helen's Restaurant (ice cream)
17 Main Street, Concord, MA
helensrestaurant.net


What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and a bike in good repair

minimum 2 full water bottles (cold!).


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Road bikes are a good choice for this ride

Water, spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.

See you then

"Cue"gle sheet

http://files.meetup.com/482869/ConcordLincolnWestonRide2.txt
item.name: Concord, Sudbury, Lincoln, Weston Ride
